articles.title: Meghan hits out at UK media over King Charles letters - Reuters UK
articles.description: Meghan, the wife of Britain's Prince Harry, criticised the British media on Saturday over reports that letters exchanged with King Charles played a part behind her decision not to attend his coronation, her latest confrontation with the press.
articles.content: LONDON, April 22 (Reuters) - Meghan, the wife of Britain's Prince Harry, criticised the British media on Saturday over reports that letters exchanged with King Charles played a part behind her decisi… [+1353 chars]
